alert.message:
This is an alert to check that a Release ticket is failed to move to BLOCKED state, Check if the state is present in the status change flow for that board

Go to https://hs-productivity-engg.coralogix.com/#/query-new/logs?id=4BCCYIXIXzT&page=0
Select appropriate time interval 
Use this query to search 
message:"BLOCKED transition id not found for issue"
